## Checklist
- [ ] Scope is one phase/task
- [ ] Tests added/updated
- [ ] `docs/STATUS.md` updated
- [ ] ADR added/updated (if architectural decision changed)
- [ ] No secrets in code/repo
- [ ] (UI changes) screenshot attached

## Validation
- [ ] `npm test`
- [ ] `npm run lint`
- [ ] `npm run stockbot -- --help`
